long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Introducing 'TalkHeap Free Calls' extension:

*** Make Calls Anywhere, Anytime ***

With our Google Chrome extension, TalkHeap Free Calls, you can easily make phone calls just like you do on your mobile phone. Enjoy high-quality conversations with your contacts, no matter where you are, with just a few clicks.

*** CRM Integration with Hubspot and Salesforce ***

You can make calls from Hubspot and Salesforce just with a few clicks! Improve your productivity and boost your connection rate!

*** Free Trial Available ***

It offers you a free trial to experience all the features of our extension. Enjoy our phone call service without any charges and feel the convenience we bring to you.

*** Easy Installation ***

Installing our extension is easy. No complex setup is required. Simply enter the recipient's phone number, and you're ready to make calls online in no time.

*** Verified Caller ID and Remove Spam Flags ***

Make calls with verified caller ID and register your numbers to avoid spam flags. Your phone call will be verified and connected! More engagements with the customers!
